 "Thats unfortunate...if u wish our little scientist Quilldart could try and 
help you with that. We were stranded here durring a time travel accident. 
Unfortunatly out ship would not be able to handel the trip. So we will have 
to stay here for a while until we can find a source of power strong enough to 
power it up.  Do you wish to join my ranks?"

--part1_f3.1e22130c.2a682a3d_boundary
